title: Business Travel Lives Again, as Many Are Hitting the Road
sub_head: Corporate travel transactions are up significantly over the past nine weeks, with small and medium-size companies driving the acceleration
body:
Business travelers are hitting the road again.
After Covid-19â€™s Omicron wave suppressed travel volumes in January, transactions are up significantly over the past nine weeks, according to SAP Concur, a travel and expense software provider. Small and medium-size companies are driving much of the acceleration, analysts say.
